titles.title: Air America Veterans Act of 2009
To require the Director of National Intelligence to submit a report to Congress on retirement benefits for former employees of Air America, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 5/21/2009--Introduced. Air America Veterans Act of 2009 - Requires the Director of National Intelligence to report to Congress on the advisability of providing federal retirement benefits to U.S. citizens for their service prior to 1977 as employees of Air America or an associated company when such company was owned and controlled by the federal government and operated by the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA).
